#
# This file was autogenerated by TinyMPC on Tue Nov 14 05:15:07 2023
#

cmake_minimum_required(VERSION 3.0.0)
project(TinyMPC VERSION 0.2.0 LANGUAGES CXX)

set(CMAKE_CXX_STANDARD 17)
set(CMAKE_CXX_STANDARD_REQUIRED ON)

include_directories(include/Eigen)
add_subdirectory(tinympc)
add_subdirectory(src)

# Set the output folder where your program will be created
set(EXECUTABLE_OUTPUT_PATH ${PROJECT_BINARY_DIR}/out)
set(LIBRARY_OUTPUT_PATH ${PROJECT_BINARY_DIR}/out)

# Add the include directory for tinympc
include_directories(${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/tinympc)

find_package(Matlab)
matlab_add_mex(NAME tinympc_wrapper_mex SRC src/tiny_wrapper.cpp tinympc/tiny_data_workspace.hpp src/tiny_data_workspace.cpp tinympc/admm.hpp tinympc_wrapper_mex.cpp LINK_TO tinympc)
